titles.title: Economic Statute of Repose Act
A bill to establish a limitation on the bringing of product liability actions which is related to the useful life of the product involved.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 7/29/1987--Introduced. Economic Statute of Repose Act - Establishes a statute of repose (based upon the useful life of a product) for civil actions brought for damages for death or personal injury resulting from the use of a product of a character subject to the allowance for depreciation under the Internal Revenue Code.
